alert.note: Alert for Charles City; Eastern Henrico; Eastern King William; Eastern King and Queen; Gloucester; James City; New Kent; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 10:11PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Gloucester, southeastern King and Queen, central Charles City, northwestern York, New Kent, southeastern Henrico and northern James City Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1011 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Providence Forge, or over Roxbury, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small trees and blow around unsecured objects. Wind impacting handling of high profile vehicles. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Providence Forge and Ruthville around 1015 PM EDT. New Kent around 1020 PM EDT. Holdcroft around 1025 PM EDT. Barhamsville around 1035 PM EDT. Toano and Norge around 1040 PM EDT. Shacklefords around 1045 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Eltham, Chickahominy Shore, Croaker, Wayside, Mountcastle, Elko, Glendale, Lanexa, Mattaponi and Ewell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Charles City; Eastern Henrico; Eastern King William; Eastern King and Queen; Gloucester; James City; New Kent; York
